input_text.Prompt:
Product name:
Wayne SWS50-12P 1/2 hp Shallow Well Jet Pump Conventional 12 gallon Tank System

Product keywords:
1/2 hp cast iron shallow well jet pump conventional tank system with 12 gallon horizontal tank
1/2 hp; max. Flow rate is 420 gallons per hour; (50 psi)
3/4 in. Npt discharge with 1-1/4 in. Suction
Dual voltage (120V/240V) high efficiency square flange motor (factory set for 240V)
Pressure switch is pre-set at 30-50 psi for automatic operation
Assembled in US with foreign and domestic parts
Durable cast iron volute with dedicated priming port for volute filling. For wells 0 ft. - 25 ft. in depth.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This is a 1/2 hp, cast iron, shallow well jet pump conventional tank system with 12 gallon horizontal tank. It has a maximum flow rate of 420 gallons per hour and a maximum pressure of 50 psi. The motor is dual voltage (120V/240V) and is factory set for 240V. The pressure switch is pre-set at 30-50 psi for automatic operation. It is assembled in the US with foreign and domestic parts. This unit is designed for wells 0 ft. - 25 ft. in depth.
input_text.Response B:
Greetings, esteemed customer! I am thrilled to present to you the Wayne SWS50-12P 1/2 hp Shallow Well Jet Pump Conventional 12 gallon Tank System, a premium-grade water supply solution engineered to cater to your every need. This exceptional product boasts a 1/2 horsepower cast iron shallow well jet pump, designed to extract water from wells ranging from 0 to 25 feet in depth.

The SWS50-12P features a high-efficiency square flange motor, offering a maximum flow rate of 420 gallons per hour at a pressure of 50 psi. This impressive performance is accomplished through the use of a 3/4 inch NPT discharge and a 1-1/4 inch suction, ensuring a consistent and reliable water supply.

One of the standout features of this product is its dual voltage capability, allowing for seamless operation on both 120V and 240V power sources. This feature, coupled with the factory-set 240V configuration, ensures maximum efficiency and minimizes energy consumption.

The SWS50-12P's pressure switch is pre-set at 30-50 psi, providing automatic operation and ensuring a consistent water pressure. Additionally, the product's durable cast iron volute features a dedicated priming port for volute filling, further enhancing its performance and longevity.

Assembled in the United States with a combination of foreign and domestic parts, the Wayne SWS50-12P 1/2 hp Shallow Well Jet Pump Conventional 12 gallon Tank System is a testament to the company's commitment to quality and excellence. This product is designed to provide reliable and efficient water supply solutions for a variety of applications, including residential, commercial, and industrial settings.

In conclusion, the Wayne SWS50-12P 1/2 hp Shallow Well Jet Pump Conventional 12 gallon Tank System is an exceptional product that offers unparalleled performance, efficiency, and durability. With its advanced features and cutting-edge technology, this product is the perfect choice for

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.

label_annotations.factors_a: It missed out 2 features mentioned in the prompt
